00054 UDPSocket::UDPSocket() throw() :
00055     buffersize(UDP_SOCKET_DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE), address(), socket(-1)
00056 {
00057     buffer = new char[UDP_SOCKET_DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE];
00058     rebind();
00059     DOUT("UDPSocket::UDPSocket( unsigned short buffersize )");
00060     DOUT("socket = "<<socket);
00061     DOUT("buffersize = "<<UDP_SOCKET_DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE);
00062 }
00063 
00064 UDPSocket::UDPSocket(unsigned short port) throw (UDPException, NetException) :
00065     buffersize(UDP_SOCKET_DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE), address(port), socket(-1)
00066 {   
00067     buffer = new char[UDP_SOCKET_DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE];
00068     rebind();
00069     DOUT("UDPSocket::UDPSocket( unsigned short port, unsigned short buffersize )");
00070     DOUT("socket = "<<socket);
00071     DOUT("buffersize = "<<UDP_SOCKET_DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE);
00072     DOUT("port = "<<address.getPort());
00073 }
00074 
00075 UDPSocket::UDPSocket(const InetAddress& address) throw (UDPException) :
00076     buffersize(UDP_SOCKET_DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE), address(address), socket(-1) 
00077 {
00078     buffer = new char[UDP_SOCKET_DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE];
00079     rebind();
00080     DOUT("UDPSocket::UDPSocket( const InetAddress& address, unsigned short buffersize )");
00081     DOUT("socket = "<<socket);
00082     DOUT("buffersize = "<<UDP_SOCKET_DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE);
00083     DOUT("port = "<<address.getPort());
00084 }
00085 
00086 UDPSocket::~UDPSocket() {
00087     delete[] buffer;
00088     if ( socket >= 0 ) {
00089         shutdown(ALL);
00090         close(socket);
00091     }
00092 }
00093 
00094 bool UDPSocket::isBound() throw() {
00095     return socket >= 0;
00096 }
00097 
00098 void UDPSocket::unbind() throw() {
00099     shutdown(ALL);
00100     if (socket >= 0) {
00101         close(socket);
00102         socket = -1;
00103     }
00104 }
00105 
00106 void UDPSocket::rebind() throw( UDPException ) 
00107 {
00108     unbind();
00109     DOUT("Socket binding");
00110     DOUT("Socket = "<<socket);
00111     DOUT("Bind: " << address.getIPAddress());
00112     DOUT("Port = "<<address.getPort());
00113     if ( socket < 0 )
00114         if ( ( socket = ::socket(AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM, 0) ) < 0 )
00115             throw UDPException("Unable obtain a UDP socket, stop working");
00116 
00117     if ( ::bind( socket, (struct sockaddr *)&address.getAddress(), sizeof(struct sockaddr) ) < 0 ) {
00118         shutdown(ALL);
00119         std::ostringstream err;
00120         err<<"Unable to bind UDP socket to address " << address.getIPAddress()
00121             << ", port " << address.getPort();
00122         throw UDPException( err.str() );
00123     }
00124     
00125     // Set BROADCAST ACTIVE
00126     int on=1;
00127     setsockopt(socket, SOL_SOCKET, SO_BROADCAST, &on, sizeof(on));
00128     DOUT("Socket bound");
00129     DOUT("Socket = "<<socket);
00130     DOUT("Bind: " << address.getIPAddress());
00131     DOUT("Port = "<<address.getPort());
00132 }
00133 
00134 void UDPSocket::bind( unsigned short port ) throw( UDPException, NetException ) {
00135     unbind();
00136     address = InetAddress( port );
00137     rebind();
00138 }
00139 
00140 void UDPSocket::bind( const InetAddress& address ) throw( UDPException ) {
00141     unbind();
00142     this->address = address;
00143     rebind();
00144 }
00145 
00146 void UDPSocket::newBuffer( unsigned short buffersize ) throw() {
00147     delete buffer;
00148     this->buffersize = buffersize;
00149     buffer = new char[buffersize];
00150 }

00152 unsigned short UDPSocket::send( const std::string& data, const InetAddress& address ) throw ( UDPException ) {
00153     if ( !data.size() ) {
00154         std::cout<<__FILE__<<":"<<__FUNCTION__<<": You cannot send empty udp packet!!! "
00155             "( An empty packet is the shutdown declaration)\n";
00156         return 0;
00157     } else if ( data.size() > buffersize ) {
00158         throw UDPException( "Message too big for the buffer!!!" );
00159     }
00160     
00161     int bytesent;
00162     DOUT( "socket    = "<<socket );
00163     DOUT( "data      = "<<data );
00164     DOUT( "data size = "<<data.size() ); 
00165     DOUT( "IP        = "<<address.getIPAddress());
00166     
00167     if ( ( bytesent = sendto(   socket,                     // Socket
00168                     data.data(),                    // Message
00169                     data.size(),                    // Message lenght
00170                     0,                      // Send flags
00171                     (struct sockaddr *)&address.getAddress(),   // Destination address
00172                     sizeof( struct sockaddr ) ) )           // Lenght of destination address
00173                     == -1 ) {
00174         std::ostringstream err;
00175         err<<"Send failed to "<<address.getIPAddress()<<":"<< address.getPort();
00176         throw UDPException( err.str() );
00177     }
00178     DOUT( "byte sent = "<<bytesent );
00179     return bytesent;
00180 }
00181 
00182 unsigned short UDPSocket::recv( std::string& data, InetAddress& address, double timeoutSecs ) throw ( UDPException ) {
00183     RECVDOUT( "socket     = "<<socket );
00184     RECVDOUT( "&address   = "<<(std::hex)<<&address<<(std::dec));
00185     IPERDOUT( "myaddr     = "<<address.getIPAddress() );
00186     
00187     socklen_t caller_address_lenght = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in);
00188     
00189 //  std::cout<<"buffersize = " << buffersize << std::endl;
00190     
00191     bool canRead = true;
00192     
00193     if (timeoutSecs != 0.0) {
00194         fd_set rfds;
00195         struct timeval tv;
00196         FD_ZERO(&rfds);
00197         FD_SET(socket, &rfds);
00198         tv.tv_sec = 0;
00199         tv.tv_usec = (int) (timeoutSecs * 1000 * 1000);
00200         int retval = select(socket + 1, &rfds, 0, 0, &tv);
00201         canRead = (retval > 0);
00202     }
00203     
00204     int bytes_received = 0;
00205     if (canRead) bytes_received = recvfrom( socket,
00206                     buffer,
00207                     buffersize,
00208                     0,
00209                     (struct sockaddr *)&address.getAddress(),
00210                     &caller_address_lenght );
00211 
00212 //  for (size_t i = 0; i < bytes_received; i++) {
00213 //      ostringstream sas;
00214 //      sas << i << ":" << (int) buffer[i] << " (" << buffer[i] << ")   ";
00215 //      cout << sas.str() << endl;
00216 //  }
00217 
00218 //  std::cout<<"bytes_received = " << bytes_received << std::endl;
00219                     
00220     RECVDOUT("bytes received: "<<bytes_received);
00221     if ( bytes_received < 0 ) {
00222         std::ostringstream err;
00223         err<<"Receive failed ( receiving from port "<<this->address.getPort()<<" ).";
00224         RECVDOUT( "Failed IP:      "<<address.getIPAddress() );
00225         RECVDOUT( "Failed Port:    "<<address.getPort() );
00226         throw UDPException( err.str() );
00227     } else {
00228         RECVDOUT( "IP:            "<<address.getIPAddress() );
00229         RECVDOUT( "Port:           "<<address.getPort() );
00230         data.clear();
00231         data.append( buffer, bytes_received );
00232         return bytes_received;
00233     }
00234 }
00235 
00236 bool UDPSocket::shutdown( ShutdownType  how ) {
00237     return ( ::shutdown( socket, how ) != -1 );
00238 }
